content:
@Grahame Grieve I'm getting some new warnings in my IG (http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/case-reporting/branches/master/qa.html) like:

StructureDefinition/characteristics-of-home-environment: StructureDefinition.snapshot.element[15].mapping[3].map    warning value should not start or finish with whitespace

There are about 8-10 of them and they appear to be about the mappings in the base Observation StructureDefinition.
it is a typo in the base spec in R4
nothing I can do about the warning until a new technical correction for R4 comes out
Ok, as long as you are aware, all good.
